DOC.brief_summary: Investigators compare Ketamine prochlorperazinecompazine benign headache ED . Subjects randomize 1 2 group . Group 1 receive standard treatment prochlorperazinecompazine 10 mg IV along diphenhydramine 25 mg IV . Group 2 ( research arm ) receive Ketamine 0.3 mg/kg along ondansetron 4 mg IV . Subjects see 15 , 30 , 45 , 60 minute post-intervention obtain Heart Rate , Blood Pressure , Headache severity , Nausea severity , Vomiting severity , Anxiety severity , Restlessness severity . At 24-48 hour post intervention contact subject assess pain assess satisfaction migraine pain management part study . Subjects ' participation last 48 hour post headache .
DOC.brief_title: The CHECK Trial : A Comparison Headache Treatment Emergency Department : Compazine Versus Ketamine
DOC.detailed_description: Screening Visit : - Obtain sign Informed Consent Document HIPAA Authorization ( research-driven ) . - Record : Date birth , age , phone number , gender , race , ethnicity , social security number , name standard care rescue medication ( over-the-counter prescription ) , current email address ( used scheduling ) , height ( inch ) , weight ( pound ) , history traumatic brain injury , concussion , mild severe head trauma , medication use . ( research ) - Review past medical history Armed Forces Health Longitudinal Technology Application ( AHLTA ) ESSENTRIS verify inclusion/exclusion criterion . - Women childbearing potential serum pregnancy test ( 5-10 milliliter ( ml ) , approximately 1-2 teaspoon blood ) ( research-driven ) . Visit 1 : - Heart rate - Blood pressure - Headache severity via 100-mm VAS . - Nausea severity via 100-mm VAS . - Vomiting severity via 100-mm VAS . - Anxiety severity via 100-mm VAS . - Restlessness severity via 100-mm VAS . - Record type amount rescue medication ( over-the-counter prescription ) use past 7 day . ( research ) - Subjects randomize pharmacy . We use random-number generator use block ensure roughly equal sample size . Both subject investigator blind study group assignment . Subjects randomize pharmacy one two group ( research-driven ) : - Group 1 : Standard treatment arm ( prochlorperazinecompazine 10 mg IV along diphenhydramine 25 mg IV ) - Group 2 : Research arm ( Ketamine 0.3 mg/kg along ondansetron 4 mg IV ) 15 minute post treatment : - Heart rate - Blood pressure - Headache severity via 100-mm VAS . - Nausea severity via 100-mm VAS . - Vomiting severity via 100-mm VAS . - Anxiety severity via 100-mm VAS . - Restlessness severity via 100-mm VAS . 30 minute post treatment : - Heart rate - Blood pressure - Headache severity via 100-mm VAS . - Nausea severity via 100-mm VAS . - Vomiting severity via 100-mm VAS . - Anxiety severity via 100-mm VAS . - Restlessness severity via 100-mm VAS . 45 minute post treatment : - Heart rate - Blood pressure - Headache severity via 100-mm VAS . - Nausea severity via 100-mm VAS . - Vomiting severity via 100-mm VAS . - Anxiety severity via 100-mm VAS . - Restlessness severity via 100-mm VAS . 60 minute post treatment : - Heart rate - Blood pressure - Headache severity via 100-mm VAS . - Nausea severity via 100-mm VAS . - Vomiting severity via 100-mm VAS . - Anxiety severity via 100-mm VAS . - Restlessness severity via 100-mm VAS . 24-48 hour post treatment : - Subjects contact either in-person via phone follow information collect : - Subjects ask `` On scale 0-10 , 10 bad pain , current level pain ? '' - Subjects ask `` On scale 0 10 , satisfy 're migraine pain management part research study ? ( dissatisfy 0 - 10 satisfy ) - Subjects alert group randomize .
DOC.criteria: THIS STUDY IS BEING CONDUCTED AT A MILITARY INSTALLATION . YOU MUST HAVE MILITARY INSURANCE IN ORDER TO PARTICIPATE IN THIS STUDY . Inclusion Criteria Age 18 65 year present ED complaint headache Temperature le 100.4 F Diastolic blood pressure le 104 mm Hg Normal neurologic exam normal mental status Exclusion Criteria Pregnant breastfeed Meningeal sign present Acute angle closure glaucoma suspect Head trauma within previous two week Lumbar puncture within previous two week Thunderclap ( rapid ) onset headache Weight 150 kg less 40 kg Known allergy diphenhydramine Known allergy ondansetron . ( Zofran ) Known allergy Compazine Known allergy Ketamine History schizophrenia bipolar disorder History intracranial hypertension Is prisoner Patient decline informed consent NonEnglish speaking patient Attending provider exclude patient Elderly patient dementia Patients severe headache diminish decision making capability able participate
